item.description:
"Shopping and Hacking - an expose of osCommerce through the eyes of the Zend IDE"
This will be a high level presentation of both the shopping cart architecure and the Zend debugging capabilities. The presentation will start promptly and end at 7:30. Those who would like to continue the discussion can do so at the local coffee shop.

Once again Neptune Web, Inc. has graciously offered to host the Boston PHP Meetup.
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup February Meetup
